text: The 1955 Internationale Tulpenrallye was the 7th Internationale Tulpenrallye. It was won for the first time by W.J.J. "Hans" Tak, driving a Mercedes-Benz 300 SL. ==Results== {| class="wikitable" ! Pos. ! No. ! Driver ! Car !
